name: @ar.io/wayfinder-router
description: Lightweight proxy router for ar.io network gateways with verification

scripts.build:binaries: bun build --compile --target=bun-linux-x64 src/index.ts --outfile ./builds/wayfinder-router-linux-x64 && bun build --compile --target=bun-linux-arm64 src/index.ts --outfile ./builds/wayfinder-router-linux-arm64 && bun build --compile --target=bun-darwin-x64 src/index.ts --outfile ./builds/wayfinder-router-darwin-x64 && bun build --compile --target=bun-darwin-arm64 src/index.ts --outfile ./builds/wayfinder-router-darwin-arm64 && bun build --compile --target=bun-windows-x64 src/index.ts --outfile ./builds/wayfinder-router-windows-x64.exe

author: AR.IO
